site.name: ParentingHub
site.description: Your trusted parenting companion featuring expert advice, child development insights, and family-friendly activities for every stage of parenthood

posts.title: Complete Guide to Toddler Sleep Training: Gentle Methods That Work
posts.excerpt: Evidence-based sleep training techniques for toddlers aged 1-3 years with gentle, family-friendly approaches that respect your child's needs.
posts.content: Sleep training doesn't have to be stressful for parents or children. This comprehensive guide covers gentle, effective methods that help toddlers develop healthy sleep habits while maintaining the parent-child bond.
posts.author: Dr. Sarah Parent

posts.title: Positive Discipline Strategies for Preschoolers: Building Character Without Punishment
posts.excerpt: Learn effective positive discipline techniques that teach preschoolers self-control, empathy, and problem-solving skills without resorting to punishment.
posts.content: Positive discipline focuses on teaching rather than punishing. This guide provides practical strategies for guiding preschooler behavior while building their emotional intelligence and self-esteem.
posts.author: Maria Montessori

posts.title: Baby's First Year Milestones: What to Expect and When to Celebrate
posts.excerpt: Comprehensive guide to infant development milestones in the first year, including physical, cognitive, and social-emotional growth markers.
posts.content: Every baby develops at their own pace, but understanding typical milestones helps parents support their child's growth and recognize when to seek additional support.
posts.author: Dr. Emma Pediatric

posts.title: Screen Time Guidelines for Kids: Healthy Digital Habits for Modern Families
posts.excerpt: Expert recommendations for managing screen time across different age groups, plus tips for creating healthy digital habits and family media plans.
posts.content: In our digital world, teaching children healthy screen time habits is essential. This guide provides age-appropriate guidelines and practical strategies for balanced technology use.
posts.author: Dr. Tech Balance

posts.title: Fun Educational Activities for School-Age Kids: Learning Through Play
posts.excerpt: Creative and engaging educational activities that make learning fun for elementary school children while supporting academic and social development.
posts.content: Learning doesn't stop when school ends. These engaging activities help school-age children continue learning while having fun, building confidence, and developing new skills.
posts.author: Teacher Lisa
